ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
The final confrontation between Tarot and Licorice Dust comes to a dramatic end when Tarot's sexual assault is revealed. Long time loves and friendships are destroyed. Boo Cat experiences a dose of cold reality when she is exposed to the truth. Lives change - and one stops.
